related_questions.question:
4. The best arrangement of these jumbled sentences to be a good recount text is....    a. Finally I went home with my friends happily.
b.After swimming, I put on again my bathing suit and go to the bathroom to rinse my body.
c. Yesterday I went to swimming pool with my friends.
d.I brought my bag which is full of things I needed in the swimming pool.
e.I wore my clothes and put all the wet clothes into the plastic bag, so my bag would not get wet by water.
f. When we arrived there, I changed my clothes into swimsuit then I did a little warming up before I got into the pool.
A. C-d-f-e-b-a
B. a-c-b-d-f-e
C. d-c-b-f-a-e-
D. b-d-a-f-e-​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

c-d-f-b-e-a

Penjelasan: i can't find any correct answer from the option. so, i make one of mine. hope this find you helpful ^•^

related_questions.question:
2. CLAIR: Dad, can I borrow your car? i need to go to Alan's house to do our homework together    FATHER Please make sure that you get home before 8 pm
CLAIR Thanks. Dad
I'm afraid you can't
C. Yes, you can
I'm sorry, I need the car
D. No, thanks​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2. CLAIR: Dad, can I borrow your car? i need to go to Alan's house to do our homework together

FATHER Please make sure that you get home before 8 pm

CLAIR Thanks. Dad

I'm afraid you can't

C. Yes, you can

I'm sorry, I need the car

D. No, thanks​

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan ditentukan dari reaksi Clair yang berterima kasih pada ayahnya, maka jawabannya adalah poin C. Yes, you can. Pilihan lain semuanya salah.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
Passive voice     1.My brother walks the dog
 The dong ..........by my brother

2.He opened the window
 The window.......by him

3.Someone has stolen my treasure
 My treasure...........

4.The will sell the house 
 The house.......by them

5.Sam is washing the car
 The car.......by sam

6.The girls had eaten the cakes
 The cakes.......by the girls

bantu isi yang titik"nya ya plisee

​

answers.answer:

1. is walked

2. was opened

3. has been stolen by someone

4. will sold

5. is being washed
